artist: Artist: T.L. Solien; Printer: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of The Northern Star Foundation and The Fiduciary Fund
description: From a suite of five drypoints and title page in brown ink on John Koller handmade paper; housed in a beige buckram folding portfolio case and beige buckram slipcase, with relief-printed title design.
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1986.
title: Title Page for the suite "Fragments of Hope"
